content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > love crochet and connecting with other > makers check out the sweet bee > crochet facebook community click > here to join 1 this beautiful and lightweight scarf is made using dk weight yarn yarn in photos is lion brand truboo approximately 355 yards and a 4mm crochet hook perfect for spring and fall this fashionable and airy piece has gorgeous stitch definition and texture you will be using the iris stitch throughout but i have set up the measurements for length and width of course those can be adjusted to your preference but please see the notes in the pattern regarding yardage the tassels seen in the listing photo add a lovely touch but aren t required **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 335 yards of dk weight yarn i used lion brand truboo in the silver colourway - 4mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
